## Intro

Between the Tape is a small mountain bike research lab conducting data driven mountain bike journalism. All our methods, data, and code are open-source.

## Articles

- [Are Lower Tire Pressures Faster?](https://betweenthetape.github.io/tire-pressures/): an experiment to assess how mountain bike tire pressures effect performance.
- What Could Have Been: simulating the 2024 DH World Cup season, without mistakes.

## Projects

- [downhillr](https://github.com/betweenthetape/downhillr): an R package that scrapes, cleans, and exports downhill mountain bike race results.
